snippet.title: [Subbed] AMNESIA CROWD Opening
snippet.description:
Translated by silvermoon249(http://silvermoon249.livejournal.com/35290.html#cutid1)
The second fandisc of AMNESIA, released in 2013 for the PSP in Japan. As I said before in LATER opening, this game is also released for the Vita along with AMNESIA LATER as AMNESIA LATER×CROWD V Edition. This is the opening of V Edition like LATER, hence why the date shown 2014 instead of 2013. My favorite opening of the series. Enjoy! :D
Song: Akatsuki no BUTTERFLY (Butterfly of Dawn)
Singer: Oda Kaori
With this, I only have AMNESIA V, AMNESIA LATER for the android, and AMNESIA World opening left, which all of them haven't translated yet(or atleast, I haven't found it). But when I do, I'll sub them. Also, I'll upload the anime opening later since I've deleted the old one from back then.
